name: UISceneSession
desc: An object that contains information about one of your app's scenes.

items.name: var scene: UIScene?
items.desc: The scene associated with the current session.

items.name: var role: UISceneSession.Role
items.desc: The role played by the scene's content.

items.name: struct UISceneSession.Role
items.desc: Constants that indicate the possible roles for a scene.

items.name: var configuration: UISceneConfiguration
items.desc: The configuration data for creating the scene.

items.name: class UISceneConfiguration
items.desc: Information about the objects and storyboard for UKit to use when creating a particular scene.

items.name: var persistentIdentifier: String
items.desc: A unique identifier that persists for the lifetime of the session.

items.name: var stateRestorationActivity: NSUserActivity?
items.desc: An activity object you can use to restore the previous contents of your scene's interface.

items.name: var userInfo: [String : Any]?
items.desc: Custom attributes that you can associate with the scene.
